name: yoanm/jsonrpc-params-symfony-validator-sdk
description: Simple JSON-RPC params validator that use Symfony validator component

suggest.yoanm/symfony-jsonrpc-params-validator: Symfony bundle for easy JSON-RPC params validation
suggest.yoanm/symfony-jsonrpc-http-server: Symfony Bundle to convert an HTTP json-rpc request into HTTP json-rpc response
suggest.yoanm/jsonrpc-params-symfony-constraint-: To generate payload documentation from validation constraints
